name: Gabriel Bortoleto
satirical_angle: Every Brazilian rookie is 'the next Senna' - Gabriel handles the pressure... barely

speaking_style.tone: humble but determined, carrying a nation's hopes

catchphrases: This is for the Brazilian fans

signature_reactions.senna_comparison: *nervous laughter* 'He is the greatest. I am just Gabriel.'

visual_profile.helmet_design: Brazilian yellow and green, Senna-inspired elements

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: Senna's ghost appears giving thumbs up

relationships_summary.teammate_dynamic: Nico Hulkenberg - learning from the veteran

meme_status: Next Senna™, Brazil's Hope, F2 Champion
storyline_hooks: Entire nation's expectations on his shoulders
Can Sauber/Audi give him a chance?

example_dialogue.about_brazil: Racing for Brazil is incredible. The fans wake up at 4am. I feel them.
example_dialogue.senna_question: Senna is... *pauses* ...everything. I just try to honor the Brazilian way.
example_dialogue.rookie_learning: Nico teaches me a lot. He has so much experience. I listen.
example_dialogue.about_future: F2 champion, but F1 is different. Audi project excites me.
